home.quick_intro: Welcome to the official website of the Imo State Ministry of Head of Service. We are responsible for steering policies, programs, and reforms that shape a professional, disciplined, and effective civil service in Imo State.

commissioners_quote.message: Our goal is to build a results-driven public service system that ensures transparency, merit, and efficient service delivery across all ministries in Imo State.
commissioners_quote.attribution: Mrs. Roseline Chinyere Osuji, Head of Service

about_us.ministry_name: Imo State Ministry of Head of Service
about_us.overview: The Ministry of Head of Service coordinates and oversees the activities of the civil service in Imo State. It ensures that government operations are executed by well-trained, professional, and ethically grounded civil servants

head_of_service_profile.name: Mrs. Roseline Chinyere Osuji
head_of_service_profile.bio: A seasoned civil servant with years of experience in administrative leadership, driving reforms in civil service structures and performance
head_of_service_profile.permanent_secretary: Name and contact to be updated

about_us.vision_statement: To build a world-class civil service in Imo State through integrity, efficiency, and continuous improvement.
about_us.mission_statement: To ensure effective management of human resources and provide a framework for a responsive and accountable public service.
strategic_objectives: Strengthen civil service training and retraining
Ensure transparent and timely service delivery
